verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3880>taketh<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2385>James,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> bringeth them <S%G399>up<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G5308>high<s%> <S%G3735>mountain<s%> <S%G2596>apart,<s%> <S%G2398><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> was <S%G3339>transfigured<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G846>them:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> did <S%G2989>shine<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2246>sun,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2440>raiment<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5457>light.<s%>

While <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G2980>spake,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G5460>bright<s%> <S%G3507>cloud<s%> <S%G1982>overshadowed<s%> <S%G846>them:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2400>behold<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3507>cloud,<s%> which <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I am well <S%G2106>pleased;<s%> <S%G191>hear<s%> ye <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> it, they <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G4383>face,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> were sore <S%G5399>afraid.<s%> <S%G4970><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when they had lifted <S%G1869>up<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> they <S%G1492>saw<s%> no <S%G3762>man,<s%> <S%G1508>save<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3441>only.<s%>
